page.title: 12Life as a Teenager.
page.content: Our group of fifteen year olds all live within 3 miles of school. We attended a first and a middle school before moving to high school at the age of 13. We study eight subjects for our "O", 16+, and "C.S.E." Out of school we do a variety of things such as going to discos, horse-riding, playing football, rugby, netball, and cricket. We also like to watch T.V. and video films. Most of us go on holidays in England and Wales,but some of us have been to Spain,Italy and France.One girl in our group lived in Australia for many years before returning to Redditch.We are fortunate that we live in a new town,with nice housing and shopping.
